assignJurors(uint256).details: Assign jurors once randomness is fulfilled

canAssignJurors(uint256).details: Check if jurors can be assigned (randomness fulfilled)

getAssignedJurors(uint256).details: Get assigned jurors for a dispute

getDisputeWithDetails(uint256).details: Get dispute information with enhanced frontend data

returns.dispute: The dispute struct with all details

getDisputesByCreator(address).details: Get all disputes for a creator

params.creator: The address of the dispute creator

returns._0: Array of dispute IDs created by the address

params.status: The dispute status to filter by

returns._0: Array of dispute IDs with the specified status

getTimeUntilExpiry(uint256).details: Get time until randomness request expires

updateDisputeMetadata(uint256,uint256).details: Update dispute metadata for frontend display

withdrawFees(uint256).details: Withdraw accumulated fees (only contract owner or DAO)
